message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you, and I'm willing to part with it for $20,000.
Hi Alice,  $20,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm really interested in the product, but I'm only able to offer $14,000 right now.  Let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest and counter-offer. I'm willing to come down a bit, how about we meet in the middle at $17,000?
Alice,  $17,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $15,000. This is my final offer.
